page.title: 19COWES GOLF CLUB
page.content: {COWES GOLF CLUB}occupies forty acres of land in between Baring Road and Crossfield Avenue. It is a nine-hole course with a par of 70 and the main features are some very good par 3 holes. The 250 members enjoy the comfort of a very fine new club house which was built in 1983 on a new site overlooking the course and the Solent. This replaced the old one which was burnt down following an electrical storm. The two permanent green keepers have the course in very good condition and visitors are welcome to play on most days of the week by paying the Â£5 green fee. Lunches are served daily during the Spring and Summer months.
